meanings.sent1: The cyanogenic plant posed a danger to curious animals.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the cyanogenic properties of the substance.
meanings.sent3: The cyanogenic flower played a prank on the bees by releasing a toxic gas.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like cyanogenic thoughts, poisoning his mind slowly.
meanings.sent5: The cyanogenic liquid glowed ominously in the dark laboratory.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of cyanide.
meanings.sent1: The cyanogenic compound had a distinct smell.
meanings.sent2: The detective identified the cyanogenic substance at the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The cyanogenic joke left everyone puzzled at the party.
meanings.sent4: His eyes held a cyanogenic gaze that made her shiver.
meanings.sent5: The cyanogenic aura around him made people keep their distance.
